Our Latest News

Dublin-based Developer of Voice Tech for Kids Raises $6.5M

DUBLIN, Ireland (April 21st, 2020) — SoapBox Labs, pioneering developer of safe and accurate voice technology for kids, today announced new funding of $6.5M. “SoapBox is at the nexus of some big trends right now – remote learning, voice, kidtech and data privacy. We’ve invested deeply over the last 7 years in our people and our technology. With this funding we’re poised to capitalize on our strengths and the global market opportunities opening up to us in literacy, language learning and toys” says Dr. Patricia Scanlon, Founder and CEO.

); } export default News;
